short_summary: Demolition services for Fredericton Research and Development Centre, Fredericton, NB
description: INVITATION - demolition of Fredericton Research and Development Centre, Fredericton, NB
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify for Building 48 Demolition at Fredericton Research and Development Centre

## Solicitation Details
* **Reference Number**: WS4378225720
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 19, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. ET
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4378225720
* **Customs Tariff**: *72141510: Demolition services*
* **Contract Award Category**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regional Opportunities**: New Brunswick
* **Contractor Contact Information**
	+ Name: Sonia Stockman
	+ Email: sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Documents and Information**
	[Visit the following URL to access the solicitation documents](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18414053?extsite=MTg0MTQwNTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Solicitation Description
A call to qualify for demolition services at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre (Building 48) is being issued. This is the first phase of a two-phase process, where suppliers will be evaluated based on their qualifications.

The contractor must:
	+ Complete the demolition and disposal of Building 48
	+ Perform the work within 10 weeks of contract award
	+ Comply with the specifications and drawings outlined in the solicitation documents

## Contract Award Criteria
Award will be based on the Selection Criteria of there being a "Lowest Price." ## Contract Award Information

* **Estimated Contract Value**: $100,001 to $500,000
* **Cost Category Description**: The estimated cost for this opportunity falls within the given cost category.

## Insurance Requirements
None outlined.

## Language and Language Requirements
Companies who submit documentation may do so in either English or French.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact Sonia Stockman at sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Please note that the request for proposal is only open to qualified participants who meet the minimum requirements outlined in the solicitation documents. Only electronic submissions will be accepted. In addition, the bid opening is not announced. # Feature Image: None. ​ # 400 words limit achieved. 








Please review and provide feedback.  Thank you!
